item.title: An Analysis Of Voting Rationale In The 2020 United States Election
item.description: Introduction A Measure Of Satisfaction In The Government Consider the following premises: Premise 0: People are satisfied in political systems that work as they are intended. Premise 1: The intent of democratic systems is for participating citizens to vote for policies to be enacted that benefit or interest them the most. Premise 2: In a democratic republic, citizens vote to elect politicians that will create and support policies that are in the citizen’s benefit or interest.
